title: HMS Carcass
text: Three ships of the <a href="Royal%20Navy">Royal Navy</a> have borne the name HMS "Carcass", named after the <a href="Carcass%20%28projectile%29">carcass</a>, an early form of <a href="Incendiary%20ammunition">incendiary</a> <a href="bomb">bomb</a> or <a href="Shell%20%28projectile%29">shell</a>:
